title: Mueller probing Russia contacts at GOP convention: sources
text:
Mueller probing Russia contacts at GOP convention: sources 3:15am BST - 01:48 
Investigators probing whether Donald Trump’s presidential campaign colluded with Russia have been questioning witnesses about events at the 2016 Republican National Convention, according to two sources familiar with Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s inquiries.   
Investigators probing whether Donald Trump’s presidential campaign colluded with Russia have been questioning witnesses about events at the 2016 Republican National Convention, according to two sources familiar with Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s inquiries.  //reut.rs/2pQCZCI
